label: 泥部穴穂部皇子
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
見出し読み: はしひとのあなほべのおうじ
見出し読み_mod: はしひとのあなほべのおうじ
説明文: d. 587  Yōmei-Tennō's half-brother [who] plotted to rebel in 586.  He had expected to become Sovereign (Tennō) and was supported in his claims by Great Deity Chieftain (Ōmuraji) Mononobe-no-Moriya (Part A, p. 137). [用明天皇、大連物部守屋]
